description: If you love a good graphic tee, then you're going to dig this one even more. That's because the Roots Studio Graphic T-Shirt for men is part of our Roots Studio Collection—a partnership with Roots Studio that helps indigenous artists preserve and celebrate their heritage arts as well as financially support their community and traditions.But the good vibes don't stop there. This tee is also made sustainably and is Fair Trade Certified™ too. So much good in one simple tee!
name: Prana Roots Studio Graphic T-Shirt - Mens
